column5: The house is in a very quiet neighborhood. Right off the freeway. Theres a patio in the front. Plenty of trees and plants around the house. There is a 50 yr old magnolia tree in front, my favorite part of the house. Living room and kitchen can be used anytime. One shared bathroom,new central ac, parking space. There is a washer and dryer you can use. If you are looking for a place away from the city but still want to be near to the city, this is the place for you.
